AD.name: Max Connections per Host
AD.description: Defines the maximum number of connections allowed per host configuration.

AD.name: Socket Timeout
AD.description: Defines the socket timeout in milliseconds which is the timeout for waiting for data.

AD.name: Connection Timeout
AD.description: Determines the timeout in milliseconds until a connection is etablished.

AD.name: Maximum size of documents to download
AD.description: Defines the size limit for documents to fetch in kile-bytes. A value of -1 allows every file-size. Only in effect if supported by the server.

AD.name: Use Accept Encoding
AD.description: Specifies whether the crawler should use AcceptEncoding and encourage servers to send compressed responses

AD.name: Use Proxy
AD.description: Enables or disables use of the proxy specified

AD.name: Proxy Host
AD.description: Name or IP of the host where the proxy resides

AD.name: Proxy Port
AD.description: Port on which the proxy listens for connections (-1 for the default protocol port)

AD.name: Proxy User
AD.description: Username (if needed) used to authenticate at the proxy

AD.name: Proxy Password
AD.description: Password (if needed) used to authenticate at the proxy
